SELECT DD.DOCTOR_NAME ,DD.DOCTOR_MAJOR ,DH.HOSPITAL_NAME ,DH.HOSPITAL_CALL FROM DT_DOCTOR DD JOIN DT_HOSPITAL DH ON DD.HOSPITAL_NUMBER = DH.HOSPITAL_NUMBER WHERE DD.DOCTOR_MAJOR = '내과'
